product_name: Michelin Pro4 Service Course Foldable Bike Tire - 700 x 23 / 700 x 25
long_description: The Michelin Pro4 Service Course foldable clincher bike tire strikes a balance between fast, race-ready performance and long-lasting resilience, not to mention puncture protection and a light weight. 110 tpi casing is backed with a nylon, high-density puncture-resistant belt to deter flats. Dual-compound tread is firmer along the center for increased longevity, with the shoulders getting a softer compound for excellent cornering. Recommended pressure for the Michelin Pro4 Service Course foldable clincher bike tire is 87 - 116 psi (6 - 8 BAR).
short_description: The Michelin Pro4 Service Course foldable clincher bike tire strikes a balance between fast, race-ready performance and long-lasting resilience, not to mention puncture protection and a light weight.
